Metadata.Title: 14 POISONS IN A TASK
Metadata.Description: 3 Lethal Flowers3 Lethal pills3 Lethal poisons in your pocket5 Lethal Frogsand a little luck.If I were you, I wouldn't poison Cocaine many times，because it would lead to a miscarriage of justice.3个致命花朵3个致命药丸自带三个致命毒药再加上一点运气如果我是你，我就不会多次在可卡因里下毒，因为这会导致击杀手法的误判
